SEARCH
Package BE

Class Student

java.lang.Object
BE.User
BE.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuDisplayable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampCommitteeMember, CampCommitteeMember, CommitteeMember
public class Student extends User implements MenuDisplayable
Represents a Student user, inheriting from the User class and implementing MenuDisplayable.

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String ntuNetworkId, String faculty)
      Constructs a Student object with the given parameters and initializes lists and values.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student.
      ntuNetworkId - The NTU network ID of the student.
      faculty - The faculty of the student.

    • withdrawFromCamp

      public void withdrawFromCamp(Camp camp)
      Withdraws the student from a camp by marking the withdrawal status for the given camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to withdraw from.

    • hasWithdrawnFromCamp

      public boolean hasWithdrawnFromCamp(Camp camp)
      Checks if the student has withdrawn from the specified camp previously.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to check for withdrawal status.
      Returns:
      True if the student has previously withdrawn from the camp, otherwise false.

    • findStudentByUsername

      public Student findStudentByUsername(ArrayList<User> usersData, String username)
      Finds a student by username within the given list of user data.
      Parameters:
      usersData - The list of users' data to search within.
      username - The username to search for.
      Returns:
      The found Student object, or null if not found.

    • addPointsForSuggestion

      public void addPointsForSuggestion()
      Adds points for submitting a suggestion. Increases both total points and suggestion points.

    • removePointForDeleteSuggestion

      public void removePointForDeleteSuggestion()
      Removes points for deleting a suggestion. Decreases both total points, suggestion points, and the count of approved suggestions.

    • addPointsForAcceptedSuggestion

      public void addPointsForAcceptedSuggestion()
      Adds points for an accepted suggestion. Increases total points and the count of approved suggestions.
